title: Work - box pulled by force F0 at angle theta

content.description: A box of mass <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math> is moving to the right along a horizontal surface with negligible friction with initial speed <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>v</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math>. A constant pulling force <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> is exerted on the box at an angle <math alttext="theta" overflow="scroll"><mi>θ</mi></math> with the horizontal, as shown in the figure.
content.question: What is the displacement of the box while the box’s velocity increases from <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>v</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math> to <math alttext="2 v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half times the fraction with numerator M times v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator F sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one half times the fraction with numerator M times v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator F sub 0, end sub, times the cosine of theta, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="three halves times the fraction with numerator M times v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator F sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="three halves times the fraction with numerator M times v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator F sub 0, end sub, times the cosine of theta, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="three halves times the fraction with numerator M times v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator F sub 0, end sub, times the cosine of theta, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
